item.title: Free Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana / SSY Calculator for India by NivesGuru
item.description: Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana (SSY) is a government-backed savings scheme designed to encourage parents to save for the future of their daughters. The scheme was launched by the Government of India in 2015 as part of the Beti Bachao, Beti Padhao campaign.

item.title: Public Provident Fund Calculator: Plan Your Retirement Your Savings
item.description: Public Provident Fund (PPF) is a long-term investment option offered by the Indian government. It is a safe investment option that offers attractive interest rates and tax benefits.

item.title: National Pension Scheme Calculator: plan Your Retirement and Savings
item.description: The National Pension Scheme (NPS) is a government-backed retirement savings scheme in India. It is a voluntary scheme that allows individuals to save for their retirement and receive a regular income after they retire.

item.title: Atal Pension Yojana Calculator: Plan Your Retirement Savings, Returns
item.description: Atal Pension Yojana (APY) is a government-backed pension scheme aimed at providing a guaranteed minimum pension to the unorganized sector workers

item.title: Pradhan Mantri Jeevan Jyoti Bima Yojana Calculator: Insurance, Coverage
item.description: Pradhan Mantri Jeevan Jyoti Bima Yojana (PMJJBY) is a government-backed life insurance scheme that provides life insurance coverage to individuals at an affordable premium.

item.title: Pradhan Mantri Jeevan Suraksha Yojana Calculator: Plan Your Pension
item.description: Pradhan Mantri Jeevan Suraksha Yojana (PMJSY) is a government-backed life insurance scheme that provides financial protection to the family of the policyholder in the event of their untimely death.

item.title: Kisan Vikas Patra Investment Calculator: Estimate Your Growth and Returns
item.description: Kisan Vikas Patra (KVP) is a government-backed savings scheme that aims to encourage long-term savings among farmers and other individuals in rural areas.

item.title: National Savings Certificate Calculator: Plan Your Savings, Earnings
item.description: The National Savings Certificate (NSC) is a government-backed savings scheme that offers guaranteed returns on investment

item.title: Sovereign Gold Bond Calculator: Estimate Your Gold Investment Growth
item.description: The Sovereign Gold Bond (SGB) is a government-backed scheme that offers investors the opportunity to invest in gold without having to worry
